name: Soldering Iron
description: A hand tool used in soldering, which supplies heat to melt solder so that it can flow into the joint between two workpieces.

name: Angle Grinder
description: A handheld power tool used for grinding (abrasive cutting) and polishing.

name: Cordless Drill
description: A power tool that uses rechargeable batteries to drill holes and drive screws.

name: Heat Gun
description: A device used to emit a stream of hot air, usually at temperatures between 100°C and 550°C, which can be held by hand.

name: Garden Trowel
description: A small hand tool used for digging, applying, smoothing, or moving small amounts of viscous or particulate material.

name: Pruning Shears
description: A type of scissors for use on plants. They are strong enough to prune hard branches of trees and shrubs.

name: Garden Hoe
description: A tool with a thin metal blade that is often used to break up soil, remove weeds, and harvest root crops.
